sentences.en: “The news was kept under wraps for the three-day weekend”(&b{Boston Globe})
sentences.cn: “这条消息被封锁了周末的三天”(&b{波士顿环球})

sentences.en: Cut the salmon into long strips and wrap it round the circumference of the bread.
sentences.cn: 把鲑鱼切成长条，缠裹在面包上。

sentences.en: Diana is taking the opportunity to wrap up the family presents.
sentences.cn: 黛安娜利用这个机会将家人的礼物包起来。

sentences.en: He is quite wrap ped up in studies.
sentences.cn: 他专心于研究.

sentences.en: I love crisp wintry days when you wrap up in cosy winter clothes.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢清冽的冬日，可以裹着舒适的冬衣。

sentences.en: I’ve still got a few Christmas presents to wrap up.
sentences.cn: 我还有一些圣诞礼物要包起来。

sentences.en: Let's wrap up the job and go home.
sentences.cn: 我们收工回家 吧.

sentences.en: Make sure you wrap up in the cold wind.
sentences.cn: 冷风中,你一定要穿暖.

sentences.en: Mind you wrap up well if you go out.
sentences.cn: 你出外的话要围好围巾.

sentences.en: Ministers are as keen as ever to wrap their activities in a shroud of secrecy.
sentences.cn: 部长们都一如既往地迫切想要将他们的行动搞得神神秘秘的。

sentences.en: NATO defense ministers wrap up their meeting in Brussels today.
sentences.cn: 北约各国国防部长今天圆满结束了在布鲁塞尔的会议。

sentences.en: She is wrapped up in her studies.
sentences.cn: 她埋头苦读

sentences.en: they hope to wrap up negotiations within sixty days.
sentences.cn: 他们希望在60天内结束谈判。

sentences.en: They were wrapped up in criminal activities.
sentences.cn: 他们涉嫌犯罪活动

sentences.en: Tim was well wrapped up against the weather.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆穿得很暖和以御寒冷。

sentences.en: Use a cloth to wrap up the wound.
sentences.cn: 用布把伤口包起来.

sentences.en: Wrap an oilcloth round the bedroll.
sentences.cn: 行李卷儿外边再包一层油布.

sentences.en: Wrap the foil over the fish.
sentences.cn: 用箔纸把鱼包起来。

sentences.en: wrap up a business deal.
sentences.cn: 做成一笔交易

sentences.en: wrap up warm.
sentences.cn: 穿得暖和。

sentences.en: You can wrap the skirt around your waist.
sentences.cn: 你可以把裙子围在腰间.

sentences.en: You can't wrap fire in paper.
sentences.cn: 纸包不住火.

sentences.en: You'd better wrap it with a piece of clean cloth.
sentences.cn: 你最好用一块干净的布把它包起来.

words.tran_cn: 包装材料；[包装] 包装纸；书皮

phrases.tran_cn: 专心致志于；对…倾注全部注意力

trans.tran_en: a piece of thick cloth that a woman wears around her shoulders
to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
to put paper or cloth over something to cover it
